Welcome to Tortazo’s documentation!¶

Tortazo is a Audit and Attack framework for TOR’s deep web. Supports the integration with other frameworks and tools like Nessus, W3AF, Nikto, Metasploit and others, but focusing in TOR relays and hidden services as targets. Contents:

  • About Tortazo - Gentle Introduction.
    • What?
    • How?
    • Why?
    • When?
    • Who?
    • Contact?
    • Legal Warning!!

    • Other Dependencies
    • Use Tortazo: Execution Modes
    • Plugins management
  • Gather Information mode.
  • Botnet mode in Tortazo.
  • Supported Switches in Tortazo.
  • Available Plugins in Tortazo
  • Plugin Development in Tortazo
  • FAQs
